channel.title: Chapter 1: Vectors on Loon
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 1: Vectors on Loon

item.title: Vector products
item.description: okay sugga, so you know how you can multiply two numbers together? well, its kinda nice having that also be defined for vectors, so let's go ahead and do that! but how...? well, mathematicians decided to do this in two ways, the scalar product (dot product) and the vector product (cross product). Unsurprisingly, the dot product takes in two vectors and spits out a number (yes, a NUMBER, a laymans term for scalar) while the cross product takes in two vectors and spits out another vector with special properties (as we shall see)
